content: On February 21, students at Zhumadian Senior High School continued their resistance. In every classroom, a sign reading "All senior 3 students are in class" was placed facing the camera, so that the Henan Provincial Department of Education, which was connected to the network, could see it.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: I think all domestic media should report the police officerâ€™s statement so that people all over the country can know who are considered the people in the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China?

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the morning of February 22, the Lixinsha Bridge on Nansha Road in Guangzhou was hit by a ship, and a bus fell from the bridge into the cabin, reportedly with a driver and three passengers on board.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The Sanmin Island ferry has been reopened urgently, providing ferry services between Wanqingsha and Sanmin Island

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: It is reported that through surveillance, a total of five vehicles fell into the river. A bus, a truck, an electric bicycle and two trapped people were found at the scene.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
At present, the accident has caused 5 deaths. There was only one driver on the bus.
The initial judgment is that the cause of the accident is that the channel is too narrow, and the ship deviated from the route due to strong winds. When it was discovered, it was too late to correct it and hit the bridge pier.
The Lixinsha Bridge has undergone two anti-collision reinforcement projects, and the most recent anti-collision reinforcement was completed in December 2022.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Zhumadian Senior High School students' protest was successful; the school announced a holiday

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Earlier, Fenda had punished some workers who went on strike in December last year.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On February 21, a part of the roof of Shennong Supermarket in Wanhe Town, Sui County, Suizhou City, Hubei Province collapsed under the weight of snow, killing one person. The deceased was 27 years old and was the mother of a pair of five-year-old twins.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On February 22, Sina Technology published an article titled "I "Spend Huge Amounts of Money to Buy a Job" on Xiaohongshu", exposing the "job buying and selling" industry chain on Xiaohongshu.
The article stated that consulting companies would clearly mark the prices of different positions: large private enterprises marked prices ranged from 10,000 yuan, state-owned enterprises marked prices were around 200,000 yuan, and central enterprises with a system marked prices were over 450,000 yuan.
Hu Hui, a fresh master's graduate from Changchun City, Jilin Province, was discouraged after failing many interviews, and then found out on Xiaohongshu that the position she was interviewing for was marked at 140,000 yuan.
Her roommate chose to go south to work, trying to save up 300,000 yuan as soon as possible to buy a stable job back home.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Because the country deliberately ignored the Guizhou wildfire and indulged conspiracy theories
The current incident has fast-forwarded to the stage of "Japanese spies entered the Guizhou mountainous area and set fire to burn Chinese traditional medicinal materials."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: February 21, Hainan. An old man posted a video saying that he is 82 years old and was a business and technology cadre of Sinopec Wenchang Oil Company in Hainan Province. In 1993, the manager forced him to retire internally, but the company did not give him any salary or medical benefits from 1993 to 2003. The old man said that he had appealed many times, but to no avail.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: As of now, the old manâ€™s Douyin account has been banned.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Guangdong Zhanjiang Chikan proposes that cadres and employees take the lead in buying houses
On February 19, the WeChat public account "Chikan Release" issued an initiative to promote the stable and healthy development of the real estate market in Chikan District. The content mentioned that it hopes that the majority of cadres and employees will take the lead in consumption and demonstration to promote the recovery of the real estate market, and encourage the majority of cadres and employees to take the initiative to respond to the call, seize favorable opportunities, and actively participate in housing purchase activities according to their own housing needs.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On February 21, at a press conference of the Shanghai Municipal Government, Yang Chao, member of the Pudong New Area Party Committee and executive deputy mayor, said that Pudong New Area will implement the "Global Talent Attraction Partner Program" to support foreign talents to serve as legal persons in public institutions and state-owned enterprises.
In response, netizens responded with "official children are coming back to serve the people", "overseas red boys", and "grandchildren are coming back to inherit the family business"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: February 19, Tangshan, Hebei. It was reported online that the Dongmazhuang Village government had expropriated more than 10,000 mu of land, but the local village committee was reluctant to distribute the 37 million yuan in land compensation to the villagers. On that day, a large number of villagers gathered at the Dongmazhuang Village Committee to defend their rights. On February 20, some villagers came to Tangshan North Station, preparing to go to Beijing to defend their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The Associated Press reported on the Chengdu Anxun company leak, which involved how Anxun, as a hacker team of the Ministry of Public Security, attacked overseas targets and infiltrated servers, intranets, databases, etc. of other countries. The targets included "brother countries" Iran and Pakistan.
At the same time, they claimed that they could counter and monitor Twitter accounts.
However, the company's boss said at a meeting on Wednesday morning that this incident had little impact on their company.
